title: Strengthening Leadership Practical Skills: VR-Based Microlearning for Building Trauma-Informed Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can identify at least three trauma-inducing environmental elements through VR simulations.
Learners can propose at least two classroom space design plans applying Trauma-Informed (TI) principles.
Learners can establish and execute self-directed learning plans utilizing VR content in mobile environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
